author: .funnyking
content: Execution Layer will be soon "Attestation Layer", l2 systems today are using more than 1% (1B gas) of daily total gas space (100B).

author: .funnyking
content: On one hand it's an exciting trend, on the other hand it scares me a bit because I still believe that true decentralization is still only on ethereum L1. At this point getting to sharding as a data layer (as a transaction pool) becomes quite urgent.
